name: Anno 1800 - Holiday Pack
description:
The first cosmetic DLC pack of Anno 1800.

Bring the spirit of the holidays to Anno 1800™ with this new cosmetic DLC pack, which includes 23 festive ornaments to decorate your cities.
The Anno 1800™: Holiday Ornament Pack gives players a range of cosmetic ornaments to turn their industrial cities into a holiday wonderland:

A festive carousel, including fan favorite vehicles from the game.
Two Christmas trees, to fit the occasion.
Santa’s Grotto, giving your citizens a chance to share their wish lists.
Three different markets stalls for your very own Christmas market.
A jolly hoard of Christmas presents.
Two festively ornamented street lanterns.
An appropriately wintery snowman ornament.
A decorated hedge system with six tiles.
A decorated fence system with six tiles.
